dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1763 IH: Military Family Nutrition Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Panetta (for himself and Mrs. Rodgers of Washington) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to exclude from income for purposes of eligibility for the supplemental nutrition assistance program the basic allowance for housing received by members of the uniformed services.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Military Family Nutrition Act of 2023.

section.header: Exclusion of basic allowance for housing from income
section.text: Section 5(d) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2014(d)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (18), by striking and at the end,
in paragraph (19)(B) by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and, and
by adding at the end the following:
a basic allowance for housing paid to, or by a third party on behalf of, a member of a uniformed service under section 403 of title 37, United States Code.
